Class ModelFlashCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ModelFlashCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ModelFlashCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Trinh Nguyen
    Description: A single FlashCard, contains strings for front and back of card, color of the card, and ID of the card.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      ModelFlashCard(java.awt.Color cardColor, int ID)
      Constructor, creates a blank card with an assigned color and ID.
